commands.scenario: Someone you work with is about to leave for an important interview and seems nervous.
A family member is rushing out the door and their phone and keys are on the table.
commands.tú_do_command: lleva tu teléfono y tus llaves
commands.tú_dont_command: no olvides tu teléfono y tus llaves
commands.usted_do_command: lleve su teléfono y sus llaves
commands.usted_dont_command: no olvide su teléfono y sus llaves

commands.scenario: You'd like help putting the clean dishes away in the right place.
commands.tú_do_command: pon los platos en el gabinete por favor
commands.tú_dont_command: no pongas los platos encima de la mesa
commands.usted_do_command: ponga los platos en el gabinete por favor
commands.usted_dont_command: no ponga los platos encima de la mesa

commands.scenario: A student keeps looking at their phone instead of doing the assignment.
You're giving directions to someone who is lost and needs help finding their way.
Someone you know is about to tell on you for doing something you shouldn't have.
Someone is speaking too quietly. You can't hear them speaking.
You're hosting a party and a guest offers to help you clean up.
commands.tú_do_command: ayúdame con los platos por favor
commands.tú_dont_command: no te preocupes, relájate por favor
commands.usted_do_command: ayúdeme con los platos por favor
commands.usted_dont_command: no se preocupe, relájese por favor

commands.scenario: You're recommending movies that you think someone should or shouldn't watch.
You want to show someone something, and you need them to come here.
You need a translation to read a document, and you want it to be idiomatic, not word-for-word.
Someone is getting impatient waiting for something to happen.
You're a server and a customer has asked for your recommendation on what to order.
You'd like to tell someone who is getting distracted to pay attention to their work.
commands.tú_dont_command: no te distraigas con otras cosas
commands.usted_dont_command: no se distraiga con otras cosas

commands.scenario: You want to tell someone that they shouldn't hesitate to contact you.
It's late at night, and someone you live with has their music playing very loud.
commands.tú_dont_command: no pongas la música tan alta
commands.usted_dont_command: no ponga la música tan alta

commands.scenario: Someone keeps interrupting you while you're trying to share something important.
Someone you've invited to your house is at the door.
You're giving advice to someone who has an important appointment about arriving on time.
commands.tú_do_command: sal temprano para llegar a tiempo
commands.usted_do_command: salga temprano para llegar a tiempo

commands.scenario: You need to remind someone to be polite in a social situation.
You want to give someone advice for what to think about your dog.
